title: Govt yet to decide on banks to be privatised, say MoS Finance Bhagwat Karad - Economic Times
content: Govt yet to decide on banks to be privatised, say MoS Finance Bhagwat Karad  Economic Times
description: "As per inputs received from Department of Investment and Public Asset Management (DIPAM), the government has not yet decided on the banks that are to be privatised. The amendments to the relevant Acts are required to be done before initiating the process of privatisation," Karad said in a written reply to the Lok Sabha.
